item.title: The biggest Forum to discuss change
item.author: Pippa Smith,
item.description: Climate change is a hotter topic than ever. The 2014 IPCC report, hot from the press, recommends that 80%of the world’s power should be from low-carbon sources by 2050. This will limit the warming of the atmosphere to 2°C, the agreed ‘tipping point’ for disastrous consequences. UN Secretary General …
